Bert LeRoy Morris

  1. Foster Name: Bert E.
  2. Foster Family: Charles and Mae Thompson Kratz
  3. Location of Family: Salem, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Falls City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 5
  7. Date of Birth: 1907-05-02, Saratoga Springs, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2001-10-31, Ottumwa, IA
  9. Gender: male
  10. Spouse Name: Margaret Chandler
  11. Source: National Orphan Train Complex; Archives DB-Clients; Bert E. Kratz obituary (unsourced).
